name: Lickitung
flavorText:
Its tongue can be
extended like a
chameleon's. It leaves a tingling
sensation when it
licks enemies.

previous.name: Hitmonchan
previous.flavorText:
While apparently
doing nothing, it
fires punches in lightning fast
volleys that are
impossible to see.

next.name: Koffing
next.flavorText:
Because it stores
several kinds of
toxic gases in its body, it is
prone to exploding
without warning.

pokemon.name: Lickitung
pokemon.flavorText:
Its tongue can be
extended like a
chameleon's. It leaves a tingling
sensation when it
licks enemies.

pokemon.name: Lickilicky
pokemon.flavorText:
It wraps things with its extensible
tongue. Getting too close to it
will leave you soaked with drool.
